## Usage

### Angular

```html
<!-- Tag Card With Number -->
<sami-card-tag text="1"></sami-card-tag>
```



## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `align`   | `align`   |             | `string` | `'center'`  |
| `padding` | `padding` |             | `string` | `undefined` |
| `type`    | `type`    |             | `string` | `'card'`    |
